title: J
data:
==Commands==
*Pressing '''j''' will move you down one square.
*Pressing '''shift+j''' will move you in this direction until you encounter a [[monster]] or something else interesting

==Symbols==
While playing in console mode:
*'''J''' represents a [[List of jellies|jelly]]-type monster.

==History==
Prior to [[0.15]], [[list of gastropods|gastropods]] were represented by a '''j'''.
